description: This table contains additional information about patient order templates.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient order template record.

columns.name: DOSE_ADJ_ACCEPTED_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the dose adjustment is accepted


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OTP_SIGN_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the patient CSN that the order template was signed in.

columns.name: INTENDED_DISPENSE_DAYS_SUPPLY
columns.description: Indicates the intended number of days supplied by each dispense of a prescription.

columns.name: IS_OTP_DELETED_YN
columns.description:
Virtual item that determines if an order template (OTP) has been deleted or not. An order template is considered deleted if it's associated to a deleted treatment day (VI TRG 10010), it's not yet signed or released (I OTP 140), and it's either listed as deleted in a treatment day (I TRG 1060), or (for therapy plan OTPs) is no longer linked to a specific treatment day.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DOSE_ADJ_ACCEPTED_YN

columns.name: NO_REIMBURS_CODESET
columns.description: Holds the code set of the selected reimbursement code.

columns.name: SEND_TO_PHARM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reasons for sending a prescription directly to a pharmacy. For Australia e-prescribing.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Given to Patient


Dosing Point


Staged Supply


Repeats Kept on File

columns.name: RX_MOBILE_NUM
columns.description: Patient's mobile phone number. For Australia e-prescribing.

columns.name: MED_DIRECTIONS
columns.description: The directions for the linked medication for the order template in this row.

columns.name: VERB_ORD_CMT
columns.description: The verbal order comment for the order template in this row.

columns.name: NON_PREF_PROV_LVL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason why a non preferred level provider was chosen


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
